column5: Been off work since Wednesday, the Dr. sez I have puemonia peunomia ponemia infectious bronchitis.   How do I know it's infectious?  Ask the Resident Love Goddess, but I'd ask you wait a week or so for the sake of marital harmony.  He said to use two puffers, take some antibiotics, and use this cough syrup.   Let me tell you, this cough syrup if sold on Queen St, could probably pay for the rest of the junk.  So no G2G for me  .  I know you will all have a great time, enjoy.  At least this will cut down on the incriminating photos.
Dang Doug, I'm sorry to hear that, I hope you and your resident love goddess are feeling better soon.  Maureen

What you talkin about Willis ? Now who am I gonna follow around....oh Terry ! LOL  Get well Bud and don't screw around with it...nip it now. And it's "pneumonia"...we know it all toooo well in this household ! If you run low on drugs...Leah's got a drawer full.
Wow tons of people dropping out, more fish for the rest of us!  J/K Get well Doug  T
well.... now this really sucks! dang gotta go out an get some Appo juice myself now.... dang you! LOL..  get on the mend brother, thats what is important.   Gerritt.
Awww...that really stinks!!!  I'm sorry to hear that you are sick and cant make it....I was looking forward to meeting you.  Perhaps another time.  Get well soon!  bly
Dang (Kin I say that too?) Granny an I were lookin' forward to meetin' Tha Dougster, also known as dooGle. Hope you get better soon.
Just like Wayne said " What you talkin about Douglas" take care, went through that in August.. Man did I ever get puup (you know) when I finally went to the Vets
I'm really sorry to hear that, just won't be the same without you there!
Oh man douG, that bites. Take good care of yerself, and get well soon.
Doug can't make it? Dang fine reason fer me to show up then.
Stay home and rest douG! When I first went to the doc that is what I heard, broncitis, you don`t want to be like me!

Been there done that last winter with the Mycoplasma Pnuemonia Doug, it'll really kick yer butt! Do what the Doc tells ya and if you're not feeling alot better in about 5 days go back!... Get Well Soon!!!
Get well soon. That stuff is nasty.
Get better soon bud. We will all miss you..... DouG and myself were going to drive up together, I'm in Clarkson (Mississauga), if anybody needs a lift PM or post here.

We are dropping like hacking flies around here tonight, with RLG and the BigKid all flat on their backs.  Instructions have been given to The LittleOne to find another place to crash for a while, with the proviso that she may already have it and will infect others.  I have a quarantined area, but it's full of fishing gear, camping stuff, empties, old paint, bicycles, tools and etc.  It's also a little chilly, so I guess the garage is out of the question.  One of my issues, now that I'm feeling a little  better, is that I am way undersmoked, only choked back two and a half smokes all day.  Nicorette sorta helps, but I think it gives me gas.  Something is doing it right now, that's for sure.  PatB, mebbee it's a better thing that you don't pick me up tomorrow morning.  Gastric displeasure is not a thing to be shared among friends.  Best to you.
Get well soon Doug. Took me 10 days to start feel better,but then. I was slow getting the Quacks. Drags ya down a bit, so rest up, plenty of fluids. Cya !!!
Hope everyone is feeling better soon Doug.  I guess there's always Lakair.
In past years there has been another G2G for pike in Kemp bay later in March, just outside of a great wing spot.  Anyone remember 'Tune' aka Melody?
Hope you and the family get well soon Doug.  Take care bud.
Double Dang douG...I've never been to an OFC G2G without your presemce...  Get well soon pal...
beans you got PM

Awww ya little wimp you going to let a little throat tickle get ya down....... Get on out their and get a pack of players and tear the filters off and have a good day.......  OK now that I got that out of my system get well soon to all of your family.  Evil Art  and  Art
